General.Name: Era Mandiri Cemerlang Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Era Mandiri Cemerlang Tbk produces and supplies seafood products in Indonesia. It offers mahi-mahi, tuna, swordfish, oilfish, red snapper, grouper, black pomfret, octopus, spanish mackerel, shark, wahoo, goldband snapper, leather jacket, emperor, parrotfish, milkfish, and other fish products. The company also exports its products to the United States, Mexico, Ecuador, German, Holland, Poland, Portugal, Hong Kong, China, India, the Philippines, and various Middle East countries. PT Era Mandiri Cemerlang Tbk was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia.
